dict.acceptation: 知道；看到过；听到过；经历过；
认识；确信；认识到；能认出；
拥有知识、理解力或信息；知道，明白；

sent.orig: You know I know that you know. I know that you know that I know.
sent.trans: 你知道我知道你知道。我知道你知道我知道。

sent.orig: What you know, you know, what you don't know, you don't know. This is knowledge.
sent.trans: 知之为知之，不知为不知，是知也。

sent.orig: Did she know, did she know, before she went away, does she know?
sent.trans: 她知道吗，她知道吗，在她走之前，她知道吗？

sent.orig: I know that you know that I know.
You know I know that you know.
